name: Unmasking The Brain Burglar
description:
THIS IS BROKEN. The game is barely playable on mac, but absolutely unplayable on windows. you can't left click in game, which is needed. I have it here for shame, and posterity, and the hope that I will revisit it soon.

Although I have entered this into the Wizard Jam, I fully intend to keep developing this after submission to get it to a quality that I am happy with. There are a few bugs that I want squished, and some more content that I want added.

For more information, visit the Idle Thumbs Forums, where I have a devlog.
